thread.title: Guy orders single slice of cheese from McDonald’s, Twitter loses it
thread.title_full: Guy orders single slice of cheese from McDonald’s, Twitter loses it

author: Alex
title: Guy orders single slice of cheese from McDonald’s, Twitter loses it
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
The self serve kiosks at McDonald’s will get you any combination of ingredients you want on your burger. Lots of people have been creating dietary monstrosities with ten patties and every topping available. But one guy decided to see if the machine would go the other way. 
Twitter user coL_Merchant ordered a burger, but asked for no patty, bun, or toppings. The result? A single slice of American cheese. 2 
The rest of the internet was impressed with McDonald’s commitment to its customers. 3
